title: The Galloping Ghost (1931) Old Time Serial (OTS)
description:
From 1931 comes this sportsploitation serial in 12 episodes of glorious Black and White of The Galloping Ghost.  Where in the world they came up with that title is a total mystery and probably always will be.  It is about sports betting and game fixing.  The title is misleading and sensational.  Red Grange was a better player than movie actor or announcer but... here you go.  The price is right.

Plot:  A gambling ring is intent on fixing college football games.  Football
       star Harold "Red" Grange, The Galloping Ghost, is the target for the
       gamblers whose thugs try to prevent him from playing.

Chapter  1 - The Idol of Clay
Chapter  2 - Port of Peril           
Chapter  3 - The Master Mind         
Chapter  4 - The House of Secrets    
Chapter  5 - The Man Without a Face  
Chapter  6 - The Torn $500 Bill      
Chapter  7 - When the Lights Went Out
Chapter  8 - The Third Degree        
Chapter  9 - Sign in the Sky         
Chapter 10 - The Vulture's Lair      
Chapter 11 - The Radio Patrol        
Chapter 12 - The Ghost comes Back
